question:
Which among the following is a requirement for registration as PRO by a plastic waste generator?
1. Registration from any Statutory Body;
2. Minimum 10 years' experience in Waste Management (Municipal Solid Waste & Plastic Waste);
3. Success stories for disposal of Municipal Solid Waste & plastic waste;
4. TAN, GST & PAN numbers.
Choose the correct option from the choices given below:
explanation:
The following is a requirement for registration as PRO(Producer Responsibility Organization) by a plastic waste generator:
1. Registration from any Statutory Body;
2. Minimum 5 years' experience in Waste Management (Municipal Solid Waste & Plastic Waste);
3. Success stories for disposal of Municipal Solid Waste & plastic waste;
4. TAN, GST & PAN numbers.
